entities.name: Appointment
entities.description: Commitment representing a time interval with start/end times and duration.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: isAllDayEvent
attributes.description: Select whether the appointment is an all-day event to make sure that the required resources are scheduled for the full day.

attributes.name: actualEnd
attributes.description: Enter the actual end date and time of the appointment. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual duration of the appointment.

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the appointment.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Type a category to identify the appointment type, such as sales demo, prospect call, or service call, to tie the appointment to a business group or function.

attributes.name: isWorkflowCreated
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the appointment was created from a workflow rule.

attributes.name: regardingObjectId
attributes.description: Choose the record that the appointment relates to.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the purpose of the appointment.

attributes.name: isBilled
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the appointment was billed as part of resolving a case.

attributes.name: scheduledDurationMinutes
attributes.description: Shows the expected duration of the appointment, in minutes.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: optionalAttendees
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, user, or other equipment resources that are not needed at the appointment, but can optionally attend.

attributes.name: globalObjectId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the appointment in Microsoft Office Outlook. The ID is used to synchronize the appointment between Microsoft Dynamics 365 and the correct Exchange account.

attributes.name: scheduledStart
attributes.description: Enter the expected start date and time for the activity to provide details about the timing of the appointment.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the appointment's status.

attributes.name: outlookOwnerApptId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the Microsoft Office Outlook appointment owner that correlates to the PR_OWNER_APPT_ID MAPI property.

attributes.name: scheduledEnd
attributes.description: Enter the expected due date and time for the activity to be completed to provide details about the timing of the appointment.

attributes.name: actualDurationMinutes
attributes.description: Shows the value selected in the Duration field on the appointment at the time that the appointment is closed as completed. The duration is used to report the time spent on the activity.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Type the location where the appointment will take place, such as a conference room or customer office.

attributes.name: actualStart
attributes.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the appointment. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual duration of the appointment.

attributes.name: organizer
attributes.description: Enter the user who is in charge of coordinating or leading the appointment to make sure the appointment is displayed in the user's My Activities view.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the appointment.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the appointment is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled appointments are read-only and can't be edited.

attributes.name: activityId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the appointment.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Shows the business unit that the record owner belongs to.

attributes.name: priorityCode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: subcategory
attributes.description: Type a subcategory to identify the appointment type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

attributes.name: requiredAttendees
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, user, or other equipment resources that are required to attend the appointment.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user that owns the appointment.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: instanceTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of instance of a recurring series.

attributes.name: modifiedFieldsMask
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: seriesId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the recurring series of an instance.

attributes.name: originalStartDate
attributes.description: The original start date of the appointment.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: activityTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of activity.

attributes.name: isRegularActivity
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team that owns the appointment.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: isMapiPrivate
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: attachmentErrors
attributes.description: Select the error code to identify issues with the outlook item recipients or attachments, such as blocked attachments.

attributes.name: attachmentCount
attributes.description: Shows the number of attachments on the appointment.

attributes.name: activityAdditionalParams
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: SLAId
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the appointment record.

attributes.name: SLAInvokedId
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this appointment. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onHoldTime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastOnHoldTime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: sortDate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

attributes.name: isUnsafe
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: isDraft
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the appointment is a draft.

attributes.name: serviceId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for an associated service.
